API Error: "No feasible media available for ad creation" Despite Successful Asset Upload


Issue 
When attempting to create an ad via the  API, we are receiving the error "No feasible media available for ad creation" even though the asset was successfully uploaded to the CDN and is accessible.

Upload an image asset using /ad/uploadAssets endpoint (successful)
Wait 10+ seconds for asset processing
Attempt to create an ad using the uploaded asset URL

It sounds like you're encountering an issue with the API integration when creating an ad. This error typically occurs if the media asset hasn't been fully processed or recognized by the system, even though it was uploaded successfully. Here are a few steps you can try:

1. **Verify Asset Processing**: Ensure that the asset has been fully processed before attempting to create an ad. Sometimes, it might take a bit longer than expected.

2. **Check Asset URL**: Double-check that the URL you're using for the asset is correct and accessible.

3. **Retry After Delay**: If possible, wait a bit longer than 10 seconds before attempting to create the ad again.

4. **Contact Support**: If the issue persists, please reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with details of your request and any error messages received.

For more detailed guidance on API integration, you can refer to our [API Integration Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/27680147056397-API-Integration-Guide).

The error message "No feasible media available for ad creation" suggests that the media asset you uploaded might not be recognized or processed correctly by the system. Here are some steps to troubleshoot this issue:

1. **Ensure Complete Processing**: After uploading your asset, make sure it has been fully processed before using it in ad creation. Sometimes, processing can take longer than expected.

2. **Verify Asset URL**: Double-check that the URL of the uploaded asset is correct and accessible.

3. **Wait and Retry**: Consider waiting a bit longer before attempting to create an ad again, as there might be a delay in processing.

4. **Contact Support**: If you're still facing issues, please contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with details of your request and any error messages received.

For more information on API integration, you can refer to our [API Integration Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/27680147056397-API-Integration-Guide).
can i talk to a human

I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If you need further assistance, you can also reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
